mapper.select: select room.room_no, room.room_title, room.room_owner from room inner join room_user on room.room_no = room_user.room_no where room_user.member_no = #{memberNo} order by room.room_no desc
select count(*) from room_user where room_no = #{roomNo} and member_no = #{memberNo}

select member.member_no, member.member_name, member.member_email, member.member_rank from room_user inner join member on room_user.member_no = member.member_no where room_user.room_no = #{roomNo} order by member.member_name asc
mapper.delete: delete from room_user where room_no = #{roomNo} and member_no = #{memberNo}
